mean_cn: n.愤怒；残暴，暴行；  v.使震怒，使愤慨
mean_en: a strong feeling of shock and anger; an act or event that is violent, cruel or very wrong and that shocks people or makes them very angry
sentence: Three thousand yuan for a lobster? What an outrage!
sentence_trans: 三千块一只虾？真是令人愤慨！
word_etyma: out外，出 + rage怒气 → 怒气外露 → outrage粗暴
